body_html:
Sorry for commenting so late (the original mention came in while I was on vacation, and I must have missed it when I was catching up). I've been trying to move over to the newer version of the quantize_nodes rewriting rule in the Graph Transform Tool, since this python script became hard to maintain. As a sanity check, are you able to use this alternative approach?

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/tools/graph_transforms/#eight-bit-calculations
